name: 3D Wheel Words Show
description:
SPIN - SPIN - SPIN

Now in 3D!!

This game is one of the BEST Word Game and Trivia Game Ever!

Increase your guessing solving skill and solve word & phrase puzzles to win millions of points.

Features
- Perfect addictive game.
- Bring fun to you and your friends.
- Challenge your word puzzles solving skills and compete with other players worldwide!
- Your best score is publish directly to the Game Center on a High Scores table.
- Designed with nice graphics supports various categories.
- Get your word vocabulary polished over the time.
- Categories of this wheel game there are words and phrases related to animals, things, cities, locations on the map and we continuously add more and more.

Tips to play the game with fun:
- After having some points, buy a vowel to help your to start.
- You may take the risk not to solve the word or phrase, by spinning more and win more points.

Suitable for all ages!
Even if you have solved the word or phrase for a particular category in the panel.

Download Now and enjoy!
